news.title: Prof. Balestriero's collaboration with NYU CDS wins Best Paper Award at ICML Workshop!
news.description: Our joint work on 'Building Physically Plausible World Models' was recognized with the Best Paper Award at ICML. Congratulations to all collaborators!

news.title: stable-ssl enters its first major refactor!
news.description: Our open-source self-supervised learning framework, stable-ssl, begins its first major refactor to improve usability, scalability, and modularity for the community.

news.title: Welcoming new Computer Science doctoral student Leyang Hu!
news.description: We are excited to welcome Leyang Hu as a new Ph.D. student in Computer Science. Leyang will be contributing to our projects on large-scale self-supervised learning.

news.title: The group website receives major UI changes and updates!
news.description: Our website has a new look! We've rolled out major UI improvements and updated information about ongoing projects and publications.
